ListScene.Description: You are standing in an living room of a house. There is a small mailbox on the table here.
ListScene.Hint: You can 'take mailbox' to find a key.

ListScene.Description: Do you want to Open it?
ListScene.Hint: Just 'open' it!

ListScene.Description: Opening the small mailbox reveals a leaflet and a key.
ListScene.Hint: You can 'take key' to go out or 'read leaflet' to get infomation.

ListScene.Description:
WELCOME TO PyZORK! 
PyZORK is a game of adventure, danger, and cunning.
In it you will explore some of the most amazing territory ever seen by mortals to find 5 TREASURES of NATRURE ELEMENTS.
Let the adventure begin!
ListScene.Hint: ;) 'take key' to go out.

ListScene.Description: You drop the mailbox and thinking about the adventure.
ListScene.Hint: ;) 'take key' to go out.

ListScene.Description: The key can open the door then go out!
ListScene.Hint: 'go out' to collect 5 nature elements!

ListScene.Description:
You are in front of the house. In the village. 
A path leads into the Forest to the East.
ListScene.Hint: 'go east' to find the Wood Element. 'find alchemist' if you have Fire Element.

ListScene.Description:
This is a path winding through a dimly lit forest. 
There is a large tree with some low branches stands at the end of the path.
Keep go East you can see a River, something great waiting for you.
ListScene.Hint: 'find large tree' to see the Wood Element. 'go east' to get the Water Element.

ListScene.Description: It is the tallest Tree in this Forest. Something waiting for you on top of the Tree.
ListScene.Hint: 'climb tree' to get the Wood. 'go east' to the river.

ListScene.Description:
You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches.
The nearest branch above you is above your reach.
Beside you on the branch is a small bird's nest.
In the bird's nest is a large egg encrusted with precious jewels.
WOW! It is exactly a Wood Tresure.
ListScene.Hint: 'take it' then 'climb down'

ListScene.Description:
The Wood Tresure is now in your inventory!
You can climb down then find 4 other to win the PyZork!
ListScene.Hint: 'climb down' to find orther Elements.

ListScene.Description: There is a large river flowing in front of you. Something glisten inside the river with blue light. It is look like very valuable.In the Northwest of the river, It is has a Volcano!
ListScene.Hint: 'take gem', it is the Water Element.

ListScene.Description:
WOW! The Tresure chose you. It is really WATER TRESURE. You got it in your inventory.
Remember, We have to find 5 Tresures, then bring it to Temple of Nature in the South.
ListScene.Hint: 'keep going' to the northwest.

ListScene.Description: It is a Hurge Volcano. It is look very dangerous. On top the Volcano is a Gem with red light, shining and very precious.
ListScene.Hint: 'climb top' of the volcano. Something hot on it.

ListScene.Description: You are here. The Tresure of Fire here!!!
ListScene.Hint: 'take gem', the Fire Element really here.

ListScene.Description:
Yeah, We all know it is dangerous but you did it completely! You got the Fire Tresure.
Take a look, there no way to keep going. We need go back the village and find orther tresures. A alchemist is living in the village, You can ask him about the Fire and Metal Element
ListScene.Hint: 'back the village' to find the Alchemist.

ListScene.Description: The Alchemist can use Power of the Fire ELement to make a Legend Sword.
ListScene.Hint: 'create sword', it can be a rare weapon to kill the Dragon King.

ListScene.Description: The Legend Sword can kill Dragon King.
ListScene.Hint: The sword is created. Now you need to 'take the sword'.
ListScene.SceneName: The Legend Sword maked by the Alchemist

ListScene.Description: Now, you need to find the Dragon King in the South to kill him, then get the Metal Element!
ListScene.Hint: 'go south' to the Dragon Cave.

ListScene.Description: A Dragon is sleeping. His breath is hot and feel death... The Gem on his head is the Metal Element. The only way to get it is kill him. Now try it!
ListScene.Hint: 'kill the dragon with sword' to take the Metal Element.

ListScene.Description: Remember you can not kill the Dragon without your Sword! Type OK to revive at the last scene you see the Dragon.
ListScene.Hint: 'ok'

ListScene.Description: The Dragon was death. The Metal Element is now in your inventory.Keep going to the Southwest, you can see a valley. Or back to the village
ListScene.Hint: 'go southwest', you can see a Valley.

ListScene.Description: The Valley is beautiful. The Earth Element is somewhere in the valley floor.
ListScene.Hint: You can 'go to the valley floor', something good here.

ListScene.Description: Standing in the Valley Floor. The Earth Element is under the ground. Need to do something...
ListScene.Hint: You need to 'digging the ground', Earth Element is under the ground.

ListScene.Description: You taked the Earth Element. Keep going to the South, you will see the Temple of Natural. Then use all your 5 Element to save the Zork Kingdom.
ListScene.Hint: 'go to the south' and see the temple. Then use all your 5 Elements

ListScene.Description: Use your 5 elements here.
ListScene.Hint: If you collected all 5 Element, just 'use 5 elements' to win this game.

ListScene.Description:
You use the 5 Natural Elements and destroyed the pyZork. The Zork KingDoom is now reborn! 
Use @hardreset to play pyZork again.
ListScene.Hint: Congra! You win this game. Now @hardreset to play it again without hint.
